titles: A very pleasaunt [and] fruitful diologe called the Epicure, made by that famous clerke Erasmus of Roterodame, newly translated. 1545
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Gerrard, Philip.
date: the. XXIX. daie of Iuly, the yere of our Lorde. M.D.XLV. [1545]]
publisher: VVithin the precinct of the late dissolued house of the gray Friers, by Richarde Grafton, printer too the princes grace,
notes: A translation, by Philip Gerrard, of the original by Desiderius Erasmus.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
